name: Steel Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of steel, providing excellent protection for the wielder.
looks: The steel shield has a circular shape and is made entirely of thick steel. It has a handle in the back for gripping and a reinforced rim to deflect attacks.

name: Iron Axe
description: A sturdy iron axe suitable for chopping wood or cleaving through enemies.
looks: The iron axe has a wooden handle and a large, sharp iron blade. The handle is wrapped in leather for a better grip.

special_weapon_skils.axe_mastery: Grants a bonus to Axe skill when wielded.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharpened blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. It has a crossguard to protect the wielder's hand and a leather-wrapped grip for a firm hold. The pommel is simple and functional.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Allows the wielder to use sword-specific skills.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword that is sharp and reliable in combat.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a double-edged design. The hilt is made of solid iron with a leather-wrapped grip for better handling.

special_weapon_skils.swordmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill while wielding.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of steel, providing excellent hand protection.
looks: The gauntlets are made of strong steel plates that cover the hands and wrists, providing excellent protection. They have a textured surface with reinforced knuckles.

name: Amulet of Wisdom
description: An amulet that enhances the wearer's wisdom, granting greater insight and knowledge.
looks: The amulet is made of gleaming silver with an intricate design of a wise owl carved into the pendant. It hangs on a delicate silver chain.

special_effects.enlightenment: Increases experience gained from quests and exploration.

name: Steel Gauntlets

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.

name: Steel Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of steel.

name: Staff of Fire
